data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is written as a kind of "plug-in" for
    Data::FormValidator. It helps to validate the size, format and
    (image) dimensions of files uploaded with CGI.pm and conveys the
    results in a format that Data::FormValidator expects.

    Eventually I suppose it would be possible to have a module designed
    around validating regular files, and have this functionality be a
    special case of that.
